## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G42610](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G42610)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>LSH10</u>
- **Gene Name:** LIGHT SENSITIVE HYPOCOTYLS 10
- **Description:**   LIGHT-DEPENDENT SHORT HYPOCOTYLS-like protein (DUF640);(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2041514
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
